text: Ana nkuganichisya yanti chin'gambe kulechedwa kutendaga Allah nkaniŵamanyukule aŵala ŵaapuutiile ngondo (Dini Jakwe) mwa jenumanja, ni ŵanganiŵaatenda ŵanepe ŵangaŵaga Allah kwisa soni Ntenga Jwakwe ﷺ ni ŵaakulupilile kuŵa isyoŵe yapantima. Sano Allah ni Nkusimanya chenene abali syosope sya yankutenda
